name: Nedrag
description:
You are determined to grow.

You are determined to make everything right again.

Nedrag is a short plant-growing-adventure with meaning, originally created for Ludum Dare #34 alongside it's themes "Growing" and "2 button controls".

Music credits:

"Past the Edge" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
